title: Plastic Love MV (full version) Mariya Takeuchi : r/citypop - Reddit
body: Tsunagaru Connect (ツナガルコネクト) - Rina Tennoji [FULL ENG/ROM LYRICS] 22. 55 votes, 16 comments. 53K subscribers in the citypop community. A subreddit for City Pop, a Japanese style of popular music originating in the 1980s.
readable_content:
- KagamiYunichiro1999 (2020-11-21): Plastic Love MV (full version) Mariya Takeuchi
  drive.google.com

- rocren4 (2020-11-21):
  Thank you very much for sharing this video. The story telling in this full version video is not as rich as I have expected. I think they should add more short clips illustrating the two characters. Let the viewers know what kind of people they are, how much they are in common. And there needs more scenes of their unexpected acquaintances, to make their feelings for each other develop more naturally. The 2 minutes preview version got me interested, but the longer version ruined it...
